headers.subject: [tosdr:2059] [bad] Recordings from voice-powered services may be stored

html:
Applies to outlook.com skydrive.com, live.com, account.live.com, profile.microsoft.com, msn.com, bing.com, office.com, Windows Photo Gallery, Windows Movie Maker, Microsoft Mail, Windows Live Writer and "other Microsoft Services" that link to these terms (oddly enough Microsoft.com has a different ToS).



3.4. Does Microsoft have voice enabled services? Yes. If you use voice enabled services, you consent to Microsoft recording and collecting your voice input. The voice input will be used to provide the voice enabled services to you and improve Microsoft products and services. Microsoft won't use your voice input for any other purpose.

 

From <http://windows.microsoft.com/en-us/windows-live/microsoft-services-agreement> 

--
tosdr.org | twitter.com/tosdr | github.com/tosdr

subject: [bad] Recordings from voice-powered services may be stored
text:
Applies to outlook.com skydrive.com, live.com, account.live.com, 
profile.microsoft.com, msn.com, bing.com, office.com, Windows Photo 
Gallery, Windows Movie Maker, Microsoft Mail, Windows Live Writer and 
"other Microsoft Services" that link to these terms (oddly enough 
Microsoft.com has a different ToS).


3.4. Does Microsoft have voice enabled services? Yes. If you use voice 
> enabled services, you consent to Microsoft recording and collecting your 
> voice input. The voice input will be used to provide the voice enabled 
> services to you and improve Microsoft products and services. Microsoft won't 
> use your voice input for any other purpose.
>
>  
>
> From <
> http://windows.microsoft.com/en-us/windows-live/microsoft-services-agreement
> > 
>

--
